FROM node:argon 

# Create app directory 
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

# Install app dependencies 
COPY package.json /usr/src/app/ 
RUN npm install bower -g && npm cache clean --force;
RUN npm install && bower --allow-root install bower.json && npm cache clean --force;

# Bundle app source 
COPY . /usr/src/app 

EXPOSE 3021 
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
